cardList.front: ¿Dónde fuiste de vacaciones el verano pasado?
cardList.back: Where did you go on holiday last summer?

cardList.front: ¿Qué cosas interesantes hiciste en ese viaje?
cardList.back: What interesting things did you do on that trip?
How long did your vacation last?

cardList.front: ¿Qué comida rica comiste el sábado pasado?
cardList.back: What nice food did you eat last Saturday?

cardList.front: ¿A qué hora te levantaste el domingo por la mañana?
cardList.back: What time did you get up on Sunday morning?
Did you work or study last Sunday?

cardList.front: ¿A dónde vas el próximo viernes por la noche?
cardList.back: Where are you going next Friday night?
Why are you buying so much drinks?

cardList.front: ¿Dónde vas a celebrar la fiesta de cumpleaños?
cardList.back: Where are you going to celebrate the birthday party?
